00094 /*
00095  *      h o t s t a r t
00096  */
00097 returnValue SQProblem::hotstart(        const real_t* const H_new, const real_t* const g_new, const real_t* const A_new,
00098                                                                         const real_t* const lb_new, const real_t* const ub_new,
00099                                                                         const real_t* const lbA_new, const real_t* const ubA_new,
00100                                                                         int& nWSR, real_t* const cputime )
00101 {
00102         if ( ( getStatus( ) == QPS_NOTINITIALISED )       ||
00103                  ( getStatus( ) == QPS_PREPARINGAUXILIARYQP ) ||
00104                  ( getStatus( ) == QPS_PERFORMINGHOMOTOPY )   )
00105         {
00106                 return THROWERROR( RET_HOTSTART_FAILED_AS_QP_NOT_INITIALISED );
00107         }
00108 
00109         /* start runtime measurement */
00110         real_t starttime = 0.0;
00111     if ( cputime != 0 )
00112         starttime = getCPUtime( );
00113 
00114 
00115         /* I) UPDATE QP MATRICES AND VECTORS */
00116         if ( setupAuxiliaryQP( H_new,A_new,lb_new,ub_new,lbA_new,ubA_new ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00117                 return THROWERROR( RET_SETUP_AUXILIARYQP_FAILED );
00118 
00119 
00120         /* II) PERFORM USUAL HOMOTOPY */
00121 
00122         /* Allow only remaining CPU time for usual hotstart. */
00123         if ( cputime != 0 )
00124                 *cputime -= getCPUtime( ) - starttime;
00125 
00126         returnValue returnvalue = QProblem::hotstart( g_new,lb_new,ub_new,lbA_new,ubA_new, nWSR,cputime );
00127 
00128 
00129         /* stop runtime measurement */
00130         if ( cputime != 0 )
00131                 *cputime = getCPUtime( ) - starttime;
00132 
00133         return returnvalue;
00134 }

00137 /*
00138  *      h o t s t a r t
00139  */
00140 returnValue SQProblem::hotstart(        const char* const H_file, const char* const g_file, const char* const A_file,
00141                                                                         const char* const lb_file, const char* const ub_file,
00142                                                                         const char* const lbA_file, const char* const ubA_file,
00143                                                                         int& nWSR, real_t* const cputime
00144                                                                         )
00145 {
00146         int nV = getNV( );
00147         int nC = getNC( );
00148 
00149         returnValue returnvalue;
00150 
00151         /* consistency checks */
00152         if ( ( H_file == 0 ) || ( g_file == 0 ) )
00153                 return THROWERROR( RET_INVALID_ARGUMENTS );
00154 
00155         if ( ( nC > 0 ) && ( A_file == 0 ) )
00156                 return THROWERROR( RET_INVALID_ARGUMENTS );
00157 
00158 
00159         /* 1) Load new QP matrices from files. */
00160         real_t* H_new  = new real_t[nV*nV];
00161         real_t* A_new  = new real_t[nC*nV];
00162 
00163         if ( readFromFile( H_new, nV,nV, H_file ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00164                 return THROWERROR( RET_UNABLE_TO_READ_FILE );
00165 
00166         if ( readFromFile( A_new, nC,nV, A_file ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00167                 return THROWERROR( RET_UNABLE_TO_READ_FILE );
00168 
00169         /* 2) Load new QP vectors from files. */
00170         real_t* g_new  = new real_t[nV];
00171         real_t* lb_new = 0;
00172         real_t* ub_new = 0;
00173         real_t* lbA_new = 0;
00174         real_t* ubA_new = 0;
00175 
00176         if ( lb_file != 0 )
00177                 lb_new = new real_t[nV];
00178         if ( ub_file != 0 )
00179                 ub_new = new real_t[nV];
00180         if ( lbA_file != 0 )
00181                 lbA_new = new real_t[nC];
00182         if ( ubA_file != 0 )
00183                 ubA_new = new real_t[nC];
00184 
00185         returnvalue = loadQPvectorsFromFile(    g_file,lb_file,ub_file,lbA_file,ubA_file,
00186                                                                                         g_new,lb_new,ub_new,lbA_new,ubA_new
00187                                                                                         );
00188         if ( returnvalue != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00189         {
00190                 if ( ubA_file != 0 )
00191                         delete[] ubA_new;
00192                 if ( lbA_file != 0 )
00193                         delete[] lbA_new;
00194                 if ( ub_file != 0 )
00195                         delete[] ub_new;
00196                 if ( lb_file != 0 )
00197                         delete[] lb_new;
00198                 delete[] g_new;
00199                 delete[] A_new;
00200                 delete[] H_new;
00201 
00202                 return THROWERROR( RET_UNABLE_TO_READ_FILE );
00203         }
00204 
00205         /* 3) Actually perform hotstart. */
00206         returnvalue = hotstart( H_new,g_new,A_new,lb_new,ub_new,lbA_new,ubA_new, nWSR,cputime );
00207 
00208         if ( ubA_file != 0 )
00209                 delete[] ubA_new;
00210         if ( lbA_file != 0 )
00211                 delete[] lbA_new;
00212         if ( ub_file != 0 )
00213                 delete[] ub_new;
00214         if ( lb_file != 0 )
00215                 delete[] lb_new;
00216         delete[] g_new;
00217         delete[] A_new;
00218         delete[] H_new;
00219 
00220         return returnvalue;
00221 }

00226 returnValue SQProblem::hotstart(        SymmetricMatrix *H_new,
00227                                                                         const real_t* const g_new,
00228                                                                         Matrix *A_new,
00229                                                                         const real_t* const lb_new,
00230                                                                         const real_t* const ub_new,
00231                                                                         const real_t* const lbA_new,
00232                                                                         const real_t* const ubA_new,
00233                                                                         int& nWSR,
00234                                                                         real_t* const cputime
00235                                                                         )
00236 {
00237         if ( ( getStatus( ) == QPS_NOTINITIALISED )       ||
00238                  ( getStatus( ) == QPS_PREPARINGAUXILIARYQP ) ||
00239                  ( getStatus( ) == QPS_PERFORMINGHOMOTOPY )   )
00240         {
00241                 return THROWERROR( RET_HOTSTART_FAILED_AS_QP_NOT_INITIALISED );
00242         }
00243 
00244         /* start runtime measurement */
00245         real_t starttime = 0.0;
00246     if ( cputime != 0 )
00247         starttime = getCPUtime( );
00248 
00249 
00250         /* I) UPDATE QP MATRICES AND VECTORS */
00251         if ( setupAuxiliaryQP( H_new,A_new,lb_new,ub_new,lbA_new,ubA_new ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00252                 return THROWERROR( RET_SETUP_AUXILIARYQP_FAILED );
00253 
00254 
00255         /* II) PERFORM USUAL HOMOTOPY */
00256 
00257         /* Allow only remaining CPU time for usual hotstart. */
00258         if ( cputime != 0 )
00259                 *cputime -= getCPUtime( ) - starttime;
00260 
00261         returnValue returnvalue = QProblem::hotstart( g_new,lb_new,ub_new,lbA_new,ubA_new, nWSR,cputime );
00262 
00263 
00264         /* stop runtime measurement */
00265         if ( cputime != 0 )
00266                 *cputime = getCPUtime( ) - starttime;
00267 
00268         return returnvalue;
00269 }

00274  */
00275 returnValue SQProblem::hotstart(        const real_t* const g_new,
00276                                                                         const real_t* const lb_new, const real_t* const ub_new,
00277                                                                         const real_t* const lbA_new, const real_t* const ubA_new,
00278                                                                         int& nWSR, real_t* const cputime
00279                                                                         )
00280 {
00281         /* Call to hotstart function for fixed QP matrices. */
00282         return QProblem::hotstart( g_new,lb_new,ub_new,lbA_new,ubA_new, nWSR,cputime );

00331 #ifdef __MATLAB__

00347 /*
00348  *      s e t u p A u x i l i a r y Q P
00349  */
00350 returnValue SQProblem::setupAuxiliaryQP( const real_t* const H_new, const real_t* const A_new,
00351     const real_t *lb_new, const real_t *ub_new, const real_t *lbA_new, const real_t *ubA_new )
00352 {
00353         int nV = getNV( );
00354         int nC = getNC( );
00355 
00356         DenseMatrix *dA = new DenseMatrix(nC, nV, nV, (real_t*) A_new);
00357         SymDenseMat *sH = new SymDenseMat(nV, nV, nV, (real_t*) H_new);
00358 
00359         returnValue returnvalue = setupAuxiliaryQP ( sH, dA, lb_new, ub_new, lbA_new, ubA_new );
00360 
00361         if ( H_new != 0 )
00362                 freeHessian = BT_TRUE;
00363         freeConstraintMatrix = BT_TRUE;
00364 
00365         return returnvalue;
00366 }
00367 
00368 
00369 /*
00370  *      s e t u p A u x i l i a r y Q P
00371  */
00372 returnValue SQProblem::setupAuxiliaryQP ( SymmetricMatrix *H_new, Matrix *A_new,
00373     const real_t *lb_new, const real_t *ub_new, const real_t *lbA_new, const real_t *ubA_new
00374 )
00375 {
00376 
00377         int i;
00378         int nV = getNV( );
00379         int nC = getNC( );
00380         returnValue returnvalue;
00381 
00382         if ( ( getStatus( ) == QPS_NOTINITIALISED )       ||
00383                  ( getStatus( ) == QPS_PREPARINGAUXILIARYQP ) ||
00384                  ( getStatus( ) == QPS_PERFORMINGHOMOTOPY )   )
00385         {
00386                 return THROWERROR( RET_UPDATEMATRICES_FAILED_AS_QP_NOT_SOLVED );
00387         }
00388 
00389         status = QPS_PREPARINGAUXILIARYQP;
00390 
00391 
00392         /* I) SETUP NEW QP MATRICES AND VECTORS: */
00393         /* 1) Shift constraints' bounds vectors by (A_new - A)'*x_opt to ensure
00394          *    that old optimal solution remains feasible for new QP data. */
00395         /*    Firstly, shift by -A'*x_opt and ... */
00396         if ( nC > 0 )
00397         {
00398                 if ( A_new == 0 )
00399                         return THROWERROR( RET_INVALID_ARGUMENTS );
00400 
00401                 for ( i=0; i<nC; ++i )
00402                 {
00403                         lbA[i] = -Ax_l[i];
00404                         ubA[i] =  Ax_u[i];
00405                 }
00406 
00407                 /* Set constraint matrix as well as ... */
00408                 setA( A_new );
00409 
00410                 /* ... secondly, shift by +A_new'*x_opt. */
00411                 for ( i=0; i<nC; ++i )
00412                 {
00413                         lbA[i] += Ax[i];
00414                         ubA[i] += Ax[i];
00415                 }
00416 
00417                 /* update constraint products. */
00418                 for ( i=0; i<nC; ++i )
00419                 {
00420                         Ax_u[i] = ubA[i] - Ax[i];
00421                         Ax_l[i] = Ax[i] - lbA[i];
00422                 }
00423         }
00424 
00425         /* 2) Set new Hessian matrix,determine Hessian type and
00426          *    regularise new Hessian matrix if necessary. */
00427         /* a) Setup new Hessian matrix and determine its type. */
00428         if ( H_new != 0 )
00429         {
00430                 setH( H_new );
00431 
00432                 hessianType = HST_UNKNOWN;
00433                 if ( determineHessianType( ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00434                         return THROWERROR( RET_SETUP_AUXILIARYQP_FAILED );
00435 
00436                 /* b) Regularise new Hessian if necessary. */
00437                 if ( ( hessianType == HST_ZERO ) ||
00438                          ( hessianType == HST_SEMIDEF ) ||
00439                          ( usingRegularisation( ) == BT_TRUE ) )
00440                 {
00441                         isRegularised = BT_FALSE; /* reset previous regularisation */
00442 
00443                         if ( regulariseHessian( ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00444                                 return THROWERROR( RET_SETUP_AUXILIARYQP_FAILED );
00445                 }
00446         }
00447         else
00448         {
00449                 if ( H != 0 )
00450                         return THROWERROR( RET_NO_HESSIAN_SPECIFIED );
00451         }
00452 
00453         /* 3) Setup QP gradient. */
00454         if ( setupAuxiliaryQPgradient( ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00455                 return THROWERROR( RET_SETUP_AUXILIARYQP_FAILED );
00456 
00457 
00458         /* II) SETUP WORKING SETS AND MATRIX FACTORISATIONS: */
00459         /* 1) Make a copy of current bounds/constraints ... */
00460         Bounds      oldBounds      = bounds;
00461         Constraints oldConstraints = constraints;
00462 
00463     /* we're trying to find an active set with positive definite null
00464      * space Hessian twice:
00465      * - first for the current active set including all equalities
00466      * - second after moving all inactive variables to a bound
00467      *   (depending on Options). This creates an empty null space and
00468      *   is guaranteed to succeed. Thus this loop will exit after n_try=1.
00469      */
00470     int n_try;
00471     for (n_try = 0; n_try < 2; ++n_try) {
00472 
00473         if (n_try > 0) {
00474             // the current active set leaves an indefinite null space Hessian
00475             // move all inactive variables to a bound, creating an empty null space
00476             for (int ii = 0; ii < nV; ++ii)
00477                 if (oldBounds.getStatus (ii) == ST_INACTIVE)
00478                     oldBounds.setStatus (ii, options.initialStatusBounds);
00479         }
00480 
00481         /*    ... reset them ... */
00482         bounds.init( nV );
00483         constraints.init( nC );
00484 
00485         /*    ... and set them up afresh. */
00486         if ( setupSubjectToType(lb_new,ub_new,lbA_new,ubA_new ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00487             return THROWERROR( RET_SETUP_AUXILIARYQP_FAILED );
00488 
00489         if ( bounds.setupAllFree( ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00490             return THROWERROR( RET_SETUP_AUXILIARYQP_FAILED );
00491 
00492         if ( constraints.setupAllInactive( ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00493             return THROWERROR( RET_SETUP_AUXILIARYQP_FAILED );
00494 
00495         /* 2) Setup TQ factorisation. */
00496         if ( setupTQfactorisation( ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00497             return THROWERROR( RET_SETUP_AUXILIARYQP_FAILED );
00498 
00499                 // check for equality that have become bounds
00500                 for (int ii = 0; ii < nC; ++ii)
00501                         if (oldConstraints.getType (ii) == ST_EQUALITY && constraints.getType (ii) == ST_BOUNDED) {
00502                                 if (oldConstraints.getStatus (ii) == ST_LOWER && y[nV+ii] < 0.0)
00503                                         oldConstraints.setStatus (ii, ST_UPPER);
00504                                 else if (oldConstraints.getStatus (ii) == ST_UPPER && y[nV+ii] > 0.0)
00505                                         oldConstraints.setStatus (ii, ST_LOWER);
00506                         }
00507 
00508         /* 3) Setup old working sets afresh (updating TQ factorisation). */
00509         if ( setupAuxiliaryWorkingSet( &oldBounds,&oldConstraints,BT_TRUE ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00510             return THROWERROR( RET_SETUP_AUXILIARYQP_FAILED );
00511 
00512         /* Factorise projected Hessian
00513         * this now handles all special cases (no active bounds/constraints, no nullspace) */
00514         returnvalue = setupCholeskyDecompositionProjected( );
00515 
00516         /* leave the loop if decomposition was successful, i.e. we have
00517          * found an active set with positive definite null space Hessian */
00518         if ( returnvalue == SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00519             break;
00520     }
00521 
00522     /* adjust lb/ub if we changed the old active set in the second try
00523      */
00524     if (n_try > 0) {
00525                 // as per setupAuxiliaryQPbounds assumptions ... oh the troubles
00526                 for (int ii = 0; ii < nC; ++ii)
00527                         Ax_l[ii] = Ax_u[ii] = Ax[ii];
00528         setupAuxiliaryQPbounds (&bounds, &constraints, BT_FALSE);
00529         }
00530 
00531         status = QPS_AUXILIARYQPSOLVED;
00532 
00533         return SUCCESSFUL_RETURN;
00534 }
